content.text:
# Mohamed Rahman Swaray

Mohamed Rahman Swaray is a Sierra Leonean politician, currently serving as the Minister of Employment, Labour, and Social Security. He previously held the position of Minister of Information and Communications.
Early life and education
Swaray was born in Pujehun and grew up in Kenema, where he attended the Islamic Secondary School from 1983 to 1989. He completed his advanced level examinations at the Bo Government Secondary School. In 1991, he enrolled at Fourah Bay College, University of Sierra Leone, where he studied English and Political Science, earning a Bachelorâ€™s degree. Swaray also holds a Master of Business Administration (MBA) from the University of Westminster Business School in London, United Kingdom.
